entry.tran: 利比亚的；利比亚人（或文化）的
entry.def: Libyan means belonging or relating to Libya, or to its people or culture.
A Libyan is a Libyan citizen, or a person of Libyan origin.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Libya
1. of or relating to Libya or its people;
